body: Please add a comment like `'# tf.float32 if supported'`, and `tf.float64 if supported, tf.float32 otherwise`.
body_html: Please add a comment like '# tf.float32 if supported', and tf.float64 if supported, tf.float32 otherwise.
body_text: Please add a comment like '# tf.float32 if supported', and tf.float64 if supported, tf.float32 otherwise.
